p: Regarding terrestrial ecoregions, IPS, such as aquatic plants, trees, vines, and herbs had the largest potential to expand in Montane Grasslands and Shrublands, Temperate Broadleaf and Mixed Forests, Temperate Conifer Forests, Tropical and Subtropical Moist Broadleaf Forests, and Tundra ( Figs. 1A and 2). For freshwater ecoregions including Tropical and Subtropical Coastal Rivers, Temperate Coastal Rivers, Xeric Freshwaters, Endorheic (closed) Basins, and Montane Freshwaters, the biomes would be severely impacted by the expansion of IPS ( Figs. 1B and 2). These ecoregions are mainly distributed in Northern Europe, the UK, South America, North America, southwest China, and New Zealand ( Fig. 2).
